See the 14 * GNU General Public License for more details. 15 * 16 * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License 17 * along with this program. If not, see <https://www.gnu.org/licenses/>. 18 * 19 * Author: Lucas Hernández Abreu 20 * Contact: lucas.hernandez.09@ull.edu.es 21 */ 22 32 #ifndef ADDER_H 33 #define ADDER_H 34 35 #include "../processing_unit_interface.h" 36 42 class Adder : public ProcessingUnitInterface { 43 public: 44 // Default constructor 45 Adder(); 46 47 // Destructor 48 ~Adder(); 49 50 // Adds one to the integer pointer by the data pointer 51 void Run(void *) override; 52 53 // Doesn't allocate nothing 54 void Start(void ** = nullptr) override; 55 56 // Doesn't Doesn't delete nothing 57 void Delete() override; 58 59 // Returns a clone of Adder 60 ProcessingUnitInterface *Clone() override; 61 }; 62 63 #endif
